# Introduction

This vignette demonstrates the usage of the `compare_ancova` function from the `myANCOVAPackage`.

```{r example, echo = TRUE}
library(myANCOVAPackage)
data(mtcars)
model1 <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars)
model2 <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp + cyl, data = mtcars)

# Perform ANCOVA comparison
compare_ancova(models = list(model1, model2), covariate = "hp", data = mtcars)
